step1.title: 1. Analysis
step1.content: We conduct a study of your business, goals, and target audience. We define the appropriate digital strategy, whether to increase online visibility or for comprehensive digital transformation.

step2.title: 2. Development
step2.content: We create tailored solutions, from professional web pages to web systems and mobile apps. We apply best practices in UX/UI and search engine optimization.

step3.title: 3. Implementation
step3.content: We launch the developed solutions, configure digital marketing tools, servers, and automate processes. We conduct tests and adjustments to ensure optimal performance.

step4.title: 4. Maintenance
step4.content: We provide support and maintenance for the implemented websites and systems. We ensure that all platforms are up-to-date, secure, and functioning efficiently.

sessionWebDevelopmentAndLandingPages.title: We create websites for small businesses that are easy to use and optimized to convert visitors into customers.
sessionWebDevelopmentAndLandingPages.subtitle: Web Development & Landing Pages
sessionWebDevelopmentAndLandingPages.content: If you are a small or medium-sized business, or a self-employed professional, you know how important it is to have a good online presence. We understand that and create websites that not only showcase your products and services but also effectively connect with your customers. With a beautiful and easy-to-use design, your site will be a powerful tool to attract new business and strengthen your brand.

benefits.title: Benefits of a quality, fast, and responsive website

sessionPricing.title: Choose the best plan for you
sessionPricing.subtitle: Pricing
sessionPricing.content: Choose an affordable plan with the best features to attract your audience, retain your customers, and boost sales.

basic.title: Basic Package
basic.content: Ideal for small businesses looking to establish their online presence with a professional and functional website.

profesional.title: Professional Package
profesional.content: Perfect for growing businesses that need more than a static website to interact with their customers.

premium.title: Premium Package
premium.content: Comprehensive solution for companies that require complex and highly customized web systems.

step1.title: 1. Initial Appointment
step1.content: We have a 30-minute conversation, without obligation, to better understand your business and needs. At this stage, we discuss your ideas and goals, defining the best digital strategy to increase your online visibility.

step2.title: 2. Development
step2.content: After the budget approval, we start developing your project. We create customized solutions, from professional websites to web systems, applying the best design and search engine optimization practices.

step3.title: 3. Launch
step3.content: With the site developed and approved, we activate your platform for the public. We configure all necessary tools and ensure everything is working perfectly before the launch.

step4.title: 4. Maintenance
step4.content: We offer continuous support and maintenance for the implemented sites and systems, ensuring that all platforms are up-to-date, secure, and functioning efficiently.

item1.question: What types of websites can you develop?
item1.answer: We develop a wide range of websites, including corporate sites, online stores (e-commerce), blogs, portfolios, web applications, and single-page sites (landing pages). We adapt to the specific needs of each client.

item2.question: How long does it take to develop a website?
item2.answer: The development time depends on the complexity of the project. A basic website can take between 1 to 2 weeks, while more complex projects can take from 1 to 3 months or more.

item3.question: Do you offer maintenance services after the launch?
item3.answer: Yes, we offer maintenance and continuous support services to ensure that your website works correctly and is updated with the latest technologies and security measures.

item4.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
item4.answer: We use a variety of technologies according to the project's needs, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, frameworks like Vue.js, Nuxt, and Astro, and content management systems (CMS) like WordPress and Strapi.

item5.question: What is the approximate cost of developing a website?
item5.answer: The cost varies depending on the project's requirements. To get an exact quote, we recommend scheduling an appointment with us to explain your specific needs.

item6.question: Do you offer SEO services along with web development?
item6.answer: Yes, we offer search engine optimization (SEO) services as part of our web development package to help improve your site's visibility in search results.
